facts.1: Strawberry shortcake is a popular dessert made with fresh strawberries, whipped cream, and a biscuit or sponge cake.
facts.2: The dessert dates back to at least the 16th century.
facts.3: June is peak strawberry season in many parts of the United States.

facts.1: Flag Day in the United States commemorates the adoption of the flag of the United States on June 14, 1777.
facts.2: The holiday was established by President Woodrow Wilson in 1916.
facts.3: Flag Day is not an official federal holiday, but it is celebrated with various events and activities.

facts.1: World Blood Donor Day is celebrated on June 14th to raise awareness of the need for safe blood and blood products.
facts.2: The day also serves to thank voluntary, unpaid blood donors for their life-saving gifts.
facts.3: The event was established by the World Health Organization in 2004.
